website_summaries.verdict: If affordability is your top concern, you can't go wrong with this classic pencil duo made by one of the most iconic makeup brands.
pros: These Maybelline pencils come in a pack of 2, just as they have for decades
Wood pencils that are easy to sharpen
Versatile, as they can be used as both eyebrow and eyeliner pencils
Most users find it wears pretty well
cons: The dark brown shade has a reddish tint that won't work for everyone

customer_reviews.title: Shade dark brown is very warm toned....
customer_reviews.text: Paid around $3 and I think that's a decent price for two eyebrow pencils. They applied easily to brows but looked very fake. My main issue is with the color . The dark brown shade is very warm with an orange/red hue that didn't match my dark brown coloring nor my mothers. I hoped it would be more of a neutral tone. This should be marketed for someone with auburn/ red hair.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The best blonde eyebrow pencil !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE BEST BLONDE SHADE EVER! I have lost count how many diff brands I have tried for blonde eyebrows. This one is the best nice soft color esp. When freshly sharpened. doesn't look heavy. Can get dark if you use heavy strokes. I found this pencil 6 years ago and don't see them sold in any stores near by anymore. Glad for internet shopping
customer_reviews.author: mamaV

customer_reviews.title: Keep It Simple!
customer_reviews.text: There are sooooo many different eyebrow make-up products that can make your head spin -- but I prefer basics. Maybelline has a shade for everyone. Being a simple pencil that you sharpen just like wooden writing pencils makes it easy to maintain. The consistency. is perfect for any skin type & it has a simple lasting strength throughout the day. It hardly smears & it washes off easily for night time beauty routines. I believe in this product & have tried so many other brands & I always come back to this.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Wopp

customer_reviews.title: Medium Brown should be called Auburn
customer_reviews.text: Was between medium & dark brown and went with medium since although I have pretty dark brown hair what'sleft of my overplucked-thanks-to-the-90s eyebrowns are actually pretty blonde and have always been much lighter than my hair. Very disappointed :( Medium brown works MUCH better for auburn or anyone with red tones. It looked RIDICULOUS so matter how I tried to blend it in. Fortunately my sister dyes her hair a pretty red shade, so I'm going to unload this on her. For the price I'll try the dark brown with fingers crossed it's a true BROWN shade.
customer_reviews.author: Curil

customer_reviews.title: thank you for having the blonde shade!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these pencils for as long as I realized I had no eyebrows and it wasn't cute to walk around looking like that. I've tried gels, other brands and types of pencils, liquid stuff, brushes with tiny tubs of something else, and have always come back to these pencils. they go on smooth and last all day. my only issue is I use the blonde and that can be hard to find in stores. when I do finely find them in stores I end up buying everyone they have, but thanks to good old amazon I no longer need to worry about that!!!!
customer_reviews.author: pedikeensTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrow miracles pencil
customer_reviews.text: I use these EVERYDAY for my eyebrows. If you have light eyebrows the blonde is a beautiful light brown that works perfectly! (It took me using too dark of a color for years to finally have my sister reveal this to me lol) but yeah it works wonderful especially freshly sharpened. My eyebrows look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Kamerin Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail if applied correctly
customer_reviews.text: This eyeliner has been around for forever for a reason. This is a holy grail item. As others have mentioned. Heat the tip of the pencil very slightly with a match or lighter, wait for it to partially cool then apply. This method is absolutely necessary for the product to stay on smudge free ALL DAY. I have somewhat oily eyelids and this stuff doesn’t budge, even without a primer or setting powder. I love that it’s easy to apply, doesn’t dry up like the liquid and gel liners, and doesn’t smudge or start dripping down into fine lines like every other pencil eyeliner I’ve tried. Also , it’s extremely pigmented jet black.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur R Abbido

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and since I could never find dark brown in the store I looked here and of course amazon had it. Yayyy!! Great value also. I use as eyeliner and lip liner . Love it
customer_reviews.author: Honey & Randall

customer_reviews.title: It’s red-ish, not brown:/
customer_reviews.text: Can’t complain about the price, but unfortunately it’s useless to me.... the pencil is really hard and difficult to apply. I gave 3 stars because it appears red hue on my skin instead of dark brown. I have dark hair, and just don’t look right.....
customer_reviews.author: baob

customer_reviews.title: Perfect taupe for blondes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap fantastic brow color! Honestly the perfect color for my medium blonde hair. A lot of brow pencils are way too dark.. even the ones that say light blonde are pretty dark. This is a true taupe and perfect! They come in a 2 pack that are presharpened and ready to go. I recommend drawing on the back of your hand for a second or so to get rid of the top protective layer or you will have a hard time getting it on your brow right off the bat.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Color is way off!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the two 2 packs of these small Maybelline eyebrow pencils. Basic item right? What could go wrong? I ordered DARK BROWN, we all know what that should look like. They are labelled Dark Brown but the pencil color is actually a medium reddish brown. Can't use! WASTE OF MONEY and TIME for me! Never ran into this problem with any other brand in many years.
customer_reviews.author: Phyl

customer_reviews.title: The perfect brow liner!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for several years and like this because it isn't overly creamy, the formula is very solid and almost wax-like which makes the color build-able, easy to blend and holds the brow hairs in place. I would also say it is waterproof but not that difficult to remove either!
customer_reviews.author: Oneisha

customer_reviews.title: Lasting strength and easy beauty!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, I can't believe how fast these came in the mail! So, I'm getting dressed for an event this evening and I wanted a little bit more of a highlight for tonight's show. I can say I am already pleased with the ease of application and the fact that I don't see any smudging as I apply, my eyes usually water so I can tell early on with "water resistant" products if they are any good. I did a swipe test with 5, 10 and 15 passes to test the control of the depth of color in the application and I LOVE the consistency. I am very pleased! Maybe he's born with it. Maybe it's Maybelline. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Gentleman Grant III

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I thought $5.53 for a pack of two was an excellent price so I ordered 2 packages. I only received 1 package,so I contacted pharmapacks. They were very nice and sent me another pencil,but I had paid for 2. This time when I let them know they said I had received 6 when I only received 3 in total. They still owe me another pencil and it looks like I won’t get it.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Lomino

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the light brown and it seemed to have a bit of a red undertone. Maybe it just looked like that one me. I remember using this a lot in high school and got nostalgic and re ordered since they’re very inexpensive . They’ll do in a pinch but not my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Works awesome !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since the 70’s , great product . Stays on , don’t smear . I put a quick flame over the liner and it smooths on , always done the flame thing .
customer_reviews.author: Irenie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing compares to this brand
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is a pain to have to light the pencil to soften it but it stays on all day and all night. Nothing in my 30 years of wearing make up compares to this one. I bought really fancy liner from Ulta and it comes close but smudges half way through day - this one DOES NOT smudge. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Diana O

customer_reviews.title: Why is brown red?
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased two different shades of brown and both are reddish color. What's up with that? I gave up and moving to a new brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bemo

customer_reviews.title: This has been around for years. Hard to find locally.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my eyebrows. I ordered dark brown, as my grey hair needs the darker color on my eyebrows . These eyebrow pencils are a golden brown. This light brown looks silly on my brows. The pkg. says dark brown. Not So. Black is too dark for me. I was very disappointed when I opened the pkg.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Good blonde color, but cannot get a smooth application! I have to press down pretty hard to get any color out of it which creates harsh lines and the pencil tip starts to fall apart in chunks from the friction. Not sure if I got an expired product, but it's basically unusable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: bad batch or just a bad deal?
customer_reviews.text: This product USED to be my go-to. But each time I sharpened one of this batch, it wasn't just the point that broke break off with the lightest pressure. Everything visible inside the wood fell out. Is the new formula soft as silly putty, or was this batch defective?
customer_reviews.author: COD shopper

customer_reviews.title: This has always been the best for eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My mom used this product and my sister and I used it in our youth. It's inexpensive and works great. For an awesome eyeliner that lasts all day...we always warm the tip and then apply. Just always make sure that it's not hot. Been used that way for generations.
customer_reviews.author: Bear's Momma

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER!
customer_reviews.text: My most favorite eyebrow pencil EVER. I buy “blond” because “light brown” looks red and fake. After following the natural line of my eyebrows (with some enhancement), I take a small brush and fill in with powdered eyeshadow of similar color. The pencil and shadow bond to each other. I do a quick brush with an eyebrow brush and it’s PERFECT. Best eyebrow pencil on the market, including expensive department store brands.
customer_reviews.author: LaurenLovesDogs

customer_reviews.title: Great price. Great color for pale blondes.
customer_reviews.text: I am blonde and my eye brows are so light they hardly show up. I like going over my eyebrows with this color pencil because it is not too dark. It last for hours and I can enhance my eyebrows arch. It takes me 1 minute to do my eyebrows in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: megan mahon

customer_reviews.title: Velvet pencil
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice product velvet black with a little bit of an understatement but overall I like this product and it was worth my money
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Light brown is more like an auburn
customer_reviews.text: Overall star rating specifically based on the 'light brown' color - which is weirdly way too red. I didn't know light brown meant auburn...
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I expected
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for more of a deep auburn rather than a dark brown then this is the product for you. It is not like any other dark brown eyebrow pencil I’ve purchased before and I’ve bought several different brands and when you pick dark brown that has always been the true color you get
customer_reviews.author: G L

customer_reviews.title: Great pencils for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the velvet black shade to help fill in my eyebrows. The color was right on and it lasted all day. The liner also came off really easily with warm water and soap. Applying to my eyebrows was really easy. Using as eyeliner was a little more difficult but can be done well with some practice. A great addition to any makeup collection. Great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Davis Handley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product! ONLY brow pencil I’ll use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brow pencil and much cheaper than local drug stores! Maybelline is always delivering the best make up for value! I’ll never purchase anywhere but Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: dewey859

customer_reviews.title: Need to get Subscription Service
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil! I’ve used it for years. I use it as eyeliner and to fill in my brows. It’s not waterproof. The longevity is not the best because I sharpen it quite often to get the best point for my brows but I’m okay with that. After I find out how long it takes me to go through this product, I will turn on the subscription for this pencil.
customer_reviews.author: VERA PRICE

customer_reviews.title: My favorite pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this project, it goes perfect with my eyebrows. I think they are water resistant, I try not to rub my eyebrows anyway when they are wet or sweating. But they do get a lil shiny when wet, but that's nothing a lil dap of a napkin can't fix.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: This is more like light light brown
customer_reviews.text: I order this because I like to fill my eyebrows but this ones are more like light brown not a dark brown like it say on the packaging am a bit disappointed but my sister who is more fair skin she will have to use it but there’s nothing wrong just the wrong color shade!
customer_reviews.author: angelika

customer_reviews.title: This eyebrow pencil was fantastic! I purchased it as part of a series ...
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow pencil was fantastic! I purchased it as part of a series of makeup to use for a costume where I needed very thick brown eyebrows. This pencil went on very smoothly and was extremely durable. It lasted an entire day of wearing the costume and working in it, which is a big deal to me. While very durable, I had no issues removing it using Burt's Bees makeup removing wipes and water, which is also a big pro; nothing worse than makeup that doesn't come off! All in all, it was a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Color WAY off. Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like an okay pencil but the color is WAY off. I purchased light brown and it’s VERY orange. I can’t even use these!
customer_reviews.author: BONNIE

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smoothly, color is great, the pencils last a long time!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a different kind of pencil at the store for my eyebrows and it was awful. I bought it because I could not find the Maybelline so I was very excited to see this available on Amazon. These have been my favorites for years.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Mecham

customer_reviews.title: this is the best eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: this eyebrow pencil is better than any of the new ones that's on the market because the tip doesn't break off and it gives more control ! these are hard to find in this color ; I was happy to find it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Best Blond eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about 20 years. This is the only blond that looks natural. I've tried other blonds and the color is funny looking and the texture is too goopy. I am not finding this in the stores lately. I hope this product was not discontinued. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Traci LM

customer_reviews.title: THE WORST PRODUCT I EVER PURCHASED FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: Totally dried and stiff. As if it was sitting in the warehouse for over 15 years. It only scratched my skin no color payoff. If they are selling something cheap or like a deal it shouldn't be trash. Save your money for other better things.
customer_reviews.author: Piyus

customer_reviews.title: Best brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years to fill in my brows. I haven't found anything better. The colour is perfect and the pencil can be sharpened to a narrow point to make the brow look natural.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Dried out
customer_reviews.text: The blonde color was good but the pencils don’t flow so I had to press hard, which sometimes made an uneven dark line. It almost seemed dried out, so I tossed it out and switched to Wet ‘n Wild eyeliner pencil instead.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Native

customer_reviews.title: CHANGE IN FORMULA
customer_reviews.text: 1. Stiff and hard to use. 2. The old formula was soft and gentle and you could use it as an eyeliner too. Not with this one. 3. Leaves little bits of wax on your brow. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I brought this but the color ending up being too light. My brows is darker thank the dark brown shade I got, so I gave it to my mom. It works great for her and it last all day on her brows she says.
customer_reviews.author: S.A

customer_reviews.title: Too light a waste..
customer_reviews.text: Too light a waste..... the dark brown brow pencil to the left is the color it should be but, I guess it's to be expected for the price. Wouldn't recommend 👎🏾
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Dortch

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not especially happy with these brow pencils. It seems they used to be a lot better, easier to apply and stayed put longer. I got brown and it didn’t match well. I usually use charcoal grey but they didn’t have it.
customer_reviews.author: TKG

customer_reviews.title: Great natural color, Great price!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I have tried several other more expensive brands and this is by far my favorite! The color looks very natural on my brows and I love that I can sharpen it so I get a lot more use out of it! Great price! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ivalou Burnett

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use & Versatility - 4.2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my 15 yo daughter who is just begining to use make up for special occasions and we've both enjoyed the versatility from these pencils. The velvet black shade compliments dark features and offers variabl depth for both eyebrows and eyeliner. Will likely order again.
customer_reviews.author: z sult

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyebrow Pencil!
customer_reviews.text: I will always use this brand of eyebrow pencil. Always have. This pencil lasts a long time, goes on smoothly and doesn't easily wear off during the day. I was happy to find it so affordable on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great color and control.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many of the eye brow products and finally looked on Amazon for these pencils. I really love these. Much better control and even coverage. Perfect color.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I've Been Using This Product Since the 1980's and Love It
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product to fill in my eyebrows since the 80's. I used to use it as eyeliner all through the 1980's too. I love this stuff. You can make it as dark or as light as you want it to look, it's all up to how you apply it. Any negative reviews are due to the user.
customer_reviews.author: Shellers

customer_reviews.title: Shades do not match names
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in dark brown but when I used it it’s actually more of a reddish lighter brown. Mostly red in color.
customer_reviews.author: Nbrown

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase dark brown
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Dark brown.... it’s red. Like the color is more of a red brown. It is not what I expected. It’s better suited for redheads and not Dark brown. Do not purchase
customer_reviews.author: Callie J

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I've used these since high school wish it lasted longer but it still looks great and I can't live without my smokey eye and eyeliner... Other brands irritate my eye so much blinding me momentarily
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: My wife purchased this item and loves it. She said it is just the right color--matches her light eyebrows well. She said that when she sharpens the pencils, the pencil stays intact whereas some other brands have not--the tips fall out if they are sharpened too much.
customer_reviews.author: MFamily

customer_reviews.title: These work
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how a BLONDE color works on dark eyebrows, but it does. I have had this same pencil for 20 years now, so I think this 2 double pack is gonna last me till I die. hahahah
customer_reviews.author: SAlford

customer_reviews.title: Decent eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: They go full fast but they get the job done. My eyebrows are micro blades but time for a touch up so I’ve been using this until I can go back. It’s hard to find a blonde color I like.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Dark brown is really dark blond.
customer_reviews.text: The brow pencils would have been great except for the color. According to the package and the writing on the pencil, they are all dark brown. They are all dark blond at best, they are very light. I had to reorder another brand. I did not return them but I wanted to warn other people. I ordered a brown black and it worked out great. Take care.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Dark Brown looks like Dark Auburn
customer_reviews.text: Ordered dark brown pencils and they say dark brown but seem to be an oops; rated 4-star cuz my hair is dyed red and they still work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mlewisagain@T-town

customer_reviews.title: It's ok....
customer_reviews.text: This brow pencil is nice, but I was frustrated that the color a little off. Not the same as the picture. It also isn't the most natural look like I've had with others. But all in all it's not a bad product...
customer_reviews.author: Holly H Ong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Eyebrow Pencils
customer_reviews.text: This product has been around for many years and is a main staple in my cosmetic bag. It's inexpensive, very easy to use and doesn't run.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Horrible pencil
customer_reviews.text: Hated this product! Bought different colors they all look the same! No pigmentation! Barely any color came out when using on the brows! Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I love the color as well as how long it stays on!!! I have bought MANY top name brand eyeliners... from powder to liquid and I can honestly say that this is and has always been my favorite! I would highly recommend to friends and family! And what an AMAZING price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Summer Swabb

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: These eyebrow pencils are convenient and easy to use-- however you really need a sharpener as well- they wear down after a while and a good sharpener does the trick-- dlp
customer_reviews.author: DLP

customer_reviews.title: Maybelline Brown and Eye Pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil, it is soft, applies easily and removes easily. I have used MAC pencils for over a decade. I was often frustrated because either the color started leaking so I would end up with embarrassing black smudge around my eyes or the mechanical pencils would not last too long. I also found it was difficult to remove the eyeliner. I am so thrilled with this pencil and I am glad now that I ordered two packs.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Horrible .
customer_reviews.text: They eyebrow pencils cannot be used. I cant even get the lid off, each pencil is sealed, and cannot be opened. I just threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa G.

customer_reviews.title: Best liner!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this waterproof eyeliner and brow liner! It works perfectly! it stays on great on the waterline and doesn't smudge on your lips. You don't have to use a super hard stroke to get the color to show up or anything. it stayed on all night. I wish I would have gotten the velvet black or brown for a different look. I think I found the perfect eyeliner!
customer_reviews.author: TIah Blakeney

customer_reviews.title: This is reddish brown, NOT dark brown.  Though I usually love Maybelline, I'm disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.text: The color is NOT dark brown. It's really a reddish brown. If that's what you're looking for, you will like these pencils, but I don't like them because they are way too red looking. I want DARK BROWN. I ended up having to go to CVS and picked out a different pencil that is truly dark brown. Wet n' Wild makes it. It's called Coloricon brow & eye liner and the shade is 02 DARK BROWN. Save your money and don't buy this Maybelline liner. It's not dark brown like it promises.
customer_reviews.author: KC in New York

customer_reviews.title: Not an eyeliner & Dark brown = red.
customer_reviews.text: "Dark Brown" Is very red, only good for VERY saturated brown or actually red hair. My hair is dark but it is not colorful, I should have gotten blonde. Also it says "Eye Pencil" but it is absolutely horrible for eye liner, so I don't know what that's supposed to mean. For eyebrows it's...ok. If i got the right color it would be fine for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kaija

customer_reviews.title: Works soooo good!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been looking for an eyebrow pencil to try out and I thought why not give it a try. I honestly love it! I use it for my brows and as eyeliner! It’s so easy to work with for the price it’s good. Only thing is that they are small but it does come with two so it will last you some time. I use this and blend it with a spoolie and give it an natural look. Like I said the price is great for a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: melissa murphy

customer_reviews.title: Pencil last for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: Last all day and looks natural. I’m very particular about my brow pencil and this one works great. I’m still on the first pencil after months and I do my brows every single day! Super long lasting and my brows stay put all day.
customer_reviews.author: iesha sheesh

customer_reviews.title: Not so great eye pencils
customer_reviews.text: These eyeliner and brow pencils are not really great to use for drawing my brows. I thought they were dark but they are not dark enough and barely can see them ☹. They are too short for me to keep so I had to toss them and buy others from Ulta Beauty.
customer_reviews.author: Queen Mulani

customer_reviews.title: I don't want to give this product a bad review, as I'm sure it would work for ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't want to give this product a bad review, as I'm sure it would work for others. I have medium brown hair and when I applied this to my brows, it was very noticeable and looked awful (on me). The color is almost tinted reddish, like maybe an auburn brown. So if you have a reddish tint to your brown hair, this product could work for you, but if you're like me and you have medium brown hair it will probably look too red and not blend well.
customer_reviews.author: Loveless Family

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a low price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for years. I have blonde hair, but my eyebrows are darker - I always get the blonde color in this pencil, and it's not too light. I've tried other more expensive ones, but this works the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Great shade of blonde
customer_reviews.text: Color is great, lasts all day, and easy to use. 2 Lasted about 3 months using almost everyday. Shade of blonde has been 1 of the best I've found. Will be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: These very important
customer_reviews.text: I’m a dummy and plucked my eyebrows as a teenager.. bought a ton of these and they saved me from embarrassment 😂
customer_reviews.author: Iheart Dr.Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Orange tint
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the medium brown but when I tried it, it looked orange on my eye brows. I never fill in my brows so I'm no expert, but I'm certain that was not brown. The product seemed to go on smooth and without leaving too much product. It's easy to go overboard with product (especially for newbies)Glad it was only a couple of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Long time favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I have used for several years and was happy to find it available on Amazon. It works well for me and I will continue to use it for many more years.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: The best- but not cruelty free
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best eyeliner, even co Payed to more expensive brands. The only problem is that Maybeline still tests on animals. Wish they’d go cruelty free like Cover Girl. .
customer_reviews.author: S. Melin

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner exactly what I had hoped!
customer_reviews.text: They work great and exactly as I had hoped! I love that I get 2 of them I have enough liner for a while now! I love that it has a cap! Very easy to sharpen, they go on very smooth and nicely the color is perfect! Overall I love it and if/when I run out I will be back to buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Gortney

customer_reviews.title: good buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: used it for my eye brows , it worked pretty well considering how dark my skin tone is. It fills in the brows without looking too harsh and if you order the 2 pack here you get 4 pencils in total. I was pleasantly surprised at that.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: never use something that looks old or used. Your face is perfect
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for replacing the product,this one is in better condition I've used Maybelline since I started in 1970.
customer_reviews.author: Jen San

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed with this product. I cannot get the cap off 3 of them. So I can only use one. I have been using this product for years and I've never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Beauregard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I have used these for many years and, for the price, they are one of the best eyebrow pencils on the market.
customer_reviews.author: nydotty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with blonde hair and a real bargain
customer_reviews.text: A real bargain with two pencils. It was always hard for me to find a brow color for my very blonde brows, so very glad to find this product.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lin

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find Maybelline BLONDE
customer_reviews.text: I've used these Maybelline Expert Eyes Eye Pencils for years and love them. A few years back I decided to change the color of my hair to blonde and while I love it, it's now extremely difficult to get eye brow pencils that go nicely with blonde hair. Maybelline has them but most stores carry the other traditional colors and have dropped the blonde line. I had tried the local stores, both general merchandise and drug stores, and could no longer find them. I tried on-line and was successful. I think they're great!
customer_reviews.author: momike

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and easy application!
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyebrow pencil. Shade matches my natural eyebrow color perfectly. Easy to apply and I was able to fill in exactly where I wanted to with ease. Lasted all day. Love it!! So glad it comes with 4 sticks!!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Works just as well as much more expensive eyebrow pencils ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as much more expensive eyebrow pencils that I've tried over the years. The blonde shade helps to fill in and give color to my eyebrows, which I over-plucked when i was younger and have become white (the ones that remain) as I've aged!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara K. King

customer_reviews.title: TOO RED
customer_reviews.text: I have struggled to find a brow pencil that doesn't have too much red in it. This one is too red. I found Cover Girl rich brown is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Still have mine today...they were packed up for like a year...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these forever ago...I still have one. They are awesome. Easy to apply. Color match is spot on like the picture. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: TheDisabledBeauty

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried that the color of this pencil would be too light for me, but thankfully, it is perfect! I have wheat-colored medium ashy-blonde hair and my eyebrows are about the same color as my hair. I thought that this pencil may be for those with much lighter blonde eyebrows, but the color matches my brows very well: perfect for filling in areas that need more volume. I would imagine that this color would work well on someone with a shade or so lighter or darker than mine as well. These pencils are great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Y

customer_reviews.title: Have been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easy to use. They are my go to lip liner one in my handbag, one at my makeup table.
customer_reviews.author: Boomertoots46

customer_reviews.title: Dark brown is not dark brown
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the pencil is 5 star but the color description is way off. Dark brown is more of a lighter medium brown with a redishness to it.
customer_reviews.author: Mojo

customer_reviews.title: Works as a lip liner.
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a lip liner and I love it soooo much! I recommend using lip balm before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Prince$$

customer_reviews.title: Good value; note the medium-brown has a red tint
customer_reviews.text: I like these pencils and you can't beat the price on Amazon; think I paid about $3 for two pencils. Goes on smooth and is easy to sharpen, but beware, there is a slight red tint to the med-brown. Not sure I'll buy this color again. Otherwise, I like the product and the price point.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Oldie AND Goody
customer_reviews.text: Been using this eye pencil since 1972. It has never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: elleen

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Iʻve used these for 30 years and though Iʻve tried others from time to time I come back to these for everyday eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: PiratelyPen

customer_reviews.title: Yuck, don’t like the color
customer_reviews.text: Dull, flat color. Have to really push to get it to work. Not very realistic color. More like mousy brown.
customer_reviews.author: SG

customer_reviews.title: It is a wonderful eyeliner to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this eyeliner for over 50 years. During that time, I have tried high end products, but still end up back using this product. It stays on until you remove it and I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roxi A Boolen

customer_reviews.title: Easy application, all day wear.
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. I have used this type of eyeliner for years. I hope it will be around as long as I am! 😊❤️
customer_reviews.author: michele h

customer_reviews.title: Just the right shade to blend in with my sparse eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: When I was young my eyebrows were full, busy and dark. Over plucking has caused them to be sparse and look lighter. Dark eyebrow pencils looked like a magic marker, this was perfect. I couldn't find the lighter shade in stores near me. Thanks Amazon for having this.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the add-on price. I bought it in black to use as eyeliner; it isn’t super dark and also doesn’t stay on all day in my opinion, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Lynx

product_meta.title: Maybelline New York Expert Wear Twin Brow & Eye Pencils Makeup, Blonde, 2 Count (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:2 Count (Pack of 2)| Color:BlondeThese dual-purpose wood pencil liners deliver blendable color that shapes brows and defines eyes. Allergy tested. Suitable for sensitive eyes and contact lens wearers.
feature_bullets: Longwear and waterproof formula has been allergy tested and is suitable for sensitive eyes as well as contact lens wearers
Expert Wear Twin Brow and Eye Wood Pencil features a dual-purpose wood pencil that acts both as an eyeliner and an eyebrow pencil
Blendable color of the Expert Wear Twin Brow and Eye Wood Pencil shapes your brows and defines your eyes
The Expert Wear Twin Brow and Eye Wood Pencil is available in 5 shades ranging from Dark Brown to Velvet Black and Blonde
Long-lasting and water resistant formula is easily removed with Maybelline Expert Eyes 100 percent Oil-Free Eye Makeup Remover

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
